name: Gokuldham Society: The Nightmare
description:
Taarak Metha is one of the best Hindi Comedy show that airs on Sab TV and Pal (as of now). Inspired by the Gujarati Comic, Duniya na undha chashma, Asit Modi created this Indian Comedy Sitcom with Neela Tele Films. Most of the scenes are from Gokuldham Society which is located in Mumbai, India. The next location for the shoot is Gada Electronics which is handled by Jethalal Gada. The entire show is based on daily life events and spreading awareness. It’s the best Indian Serial with lots of Episodes.

All the characters, images, and trademarks belong to the respective owners. The game is made for enjoyment and entertainment purposes only. We do not intend any copyright. Install and enjoy the TMKOC Game.
